name: MAHAMANAV BABA AMTE BAHUUDDESHIYA SAMAJIK VIKAS SEVA SANSTHA

address: Kulkarni Wada, Gavli Galli, Near Savarkar Chowk, Shrigonda,

briefDescription: We have been in the field of tribal students empowerment since 2008 in a small town called Shrigonda in Ahmednagar district in Maharashtra. We have now taken up a herculean task of building a state of art multipurpose center for the youth belonging to all the nomadic tribes with a capacity of nearly 150 children.
